actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to authorize testimony and document production by Senate employee and representation by Senate Legal Counsel in Springfield Terminal Railway Co. v. United Transportation Union, No. 88-0117 P.

summary.text: Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Robert J. Carolla and the office of Senator George J. Mitchell in the case of Springfield Terminal Railway Co. v. United Transportation Union. Authorizes Robert J. Carolla to testify and produce records relevant to the case (including telephone records of the Senate Telecommunications Office pertaining to the office of Senator George J. Mitchell).

titles.title: A resolution to authorize testimony and document production by Senate employee and representation by Senate Legal Counsel in Springfield Terminal Railway Co. v. United Transportation Union, No. 88-0117 P.
